## admiral host delete

delete host from inventory (irevertable)

### Synopsis

delete host from inventory by hostname (-n,--hostname) ip (--ip) or host id (--id)

```
admiral host delete [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help              help for delete
  -n, --hostname string   base hostname
      --id int            host id
      --ip string         host ip
```
